SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Auth
The Auth annotation indicates that a method needs authentication to be accessed.
ClassValidationException
 
DateHelpers
The DateHelpers class is used to provide helper methods for time, date and datetime operations.
DatePattern
The DatePattern annotation helps supporting date patterns.
FrontRequestHandler
 
FrontServlet
The FrontServlet class is the main servlet of the framework.
FrontServletConfig
The FrontServletConfig class is an extended class as configuration for the main servlet.
HttpMethods
The HttpMethods enum is used to represent the HTTP methods.
HttpParam
The HttpParam annotation indicates that an argument of a method is to be bound to a HTTP parameter.
HttpParameter
The HttpParameter class is used to represent an http parameter.
HttpParameters
The HttpParameters enum is used to represent the HTTP parameters.
JavaClass
The JavaClass class is used to provide some useful methods for java class manipulation.
JavaFile
The JavaFile class is used to represent a Java file.
JavaFileException
The JavaFileException class is used to throw an exception when the file is not a java file.
Mapping
The Mapping class is used to represent the FrontServlet UrlRegexHashMap value.
ModelController
The ModelController annotation tells the framework that the class is a controller.
ModelView
The ModelView class is used to render a view when being handled by the framework.
RestAPI
The RestAPI annotation is mainly used to tell the framework that the method return value will be parsed to JSON format as response.
Scope
The Scope annotation specifies the scope of the controller.
Scopes
The Scopes enum is used to represent the scopes of the controllers.
Sessions
 
StringHelpers
The StringHelpers class is used to provide some useful methods for the framework.
UploadedFile
The UploadedFile class is used to represent an uploaded file.
UrlMapping
The UrlMapping annotation is used to map a method to a specific URL.
UrlPatternKey
The UrlPatternKey class is used to represent the URLRegexHashMap key.
UrlRegexHashMap<SK,V>
The UrlRegexHashMap class is used to provide a HashMap supporting regex.
